dialogue: 'I asked mommy what happened to the old gym leader. She said it was too sad to talk about. Grr, now I'm even more curious!'
'The last gym leader was an awful spoiled brat. At least the new one doesn't talk.'

'My friends and I figured that old sound studio was abandoned, so we went there to hang out, but get this! There was music coming from inside. A wicked guitar solo! I guess Kalliope never left after all.'
'I used to be in the same class as the old gym leader. I always thought he was stuck up, but I never expected him to do something so cruel. Good riddance.'
'Heh.. heh.. hehe... You see that graffiti over there? On the wall? The one that says the P word? Hehehehe... I did that.'
'I'm ditching school today... Don't tell anyone.'
'You ***need*** to go to an Inbalancers concert! They're SO amazing!'
'The gym leader get super annoyed if a battle takes too long so she does everything she can to make it go by in a blitz...and it works, usually to her advantage. Think fast when you're battling her.'
'There's no reason to debate it, heh.....I'm great at...y'know...crimes.'
'I stole some bubblegum! I'm great at crime!'
'I just came here for a concert and I've already been pickpocketed, like, twice. This town sucks.'
'Hey, the gym leader here works for you guys, are you ever gonna bother doing something about these atrocious crime rates with all that money of yours?'
'There’s a Snorlax who keeps attacking this one guy. Every day. I wonder what’s going on with that…'
'I really like Kalliope and the Inbalancers, but I can’t remember any of the song names. Do they even name their songs?'
I bet the real champion was the friends we made along the way
'Sunnet may be shady, but they easily have the best concerts in Misen. Nothing like that overpriced orchestral shit they have in Bellwyn, or Steldom's pop garbage.'
'What kind of music do you like? If you say country we can't be friends.'
I work at the school. I teach math.....You looked like you wanted me to say something.
'Restoration corporation? What is that? A fancy word for cop? Stay out of our town!'
'Team Knight? That's the lamest name I've ever heard. Stay out of our town'
'I don't like the Restoration Corporation, but I'll make an exception for Kalliope. She's so cool.'
'Our school is a primary school, and middle school, and high school. Yeah, it sucks'
'What am I doing? What are you, a cop?
I teach at the school...I thought they were hiring me as a librarian and now I have to deal with how loud these damn kids are...'
'Sometimes, when it's all a bit much, I'll sit in Reverb Cave for hours. Just listening.'
quests: Kalliope is standing outside her gym. She glares at you, sighs, then motions you over
Kalliope is standing outside her gym. She motions you over
'Who’s there?! I have a repel and I’m *not* afraid to use it!'
